entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers near noon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
